--- Soundwave / Pacifix / JetV / Ikoto ---

Soundwave nods in affirmation of Havotron's request. He transforms, 
and begins blocking transmissions. 

-----

Pacifix is about to respond, when JetV's scanners start to beep. They 
are picking up a weird enegry disruption ahead of the autobot ship, 
and they they pick up a decepticon ship following them on their tail! 

"Uhh, Pacifix, we've got some wierd energy disruption ahead of us..." 
JetV says nervously to Pacifix.

Pacifix frowns, and checks the scanners himself. His eyes widden at 
signs, "Whoa, that's a lot of concentrated power...

-----

As the Autobot ship enters open space, the Azafroth and the Ikoto 
prepare in anxious silence. Azafroth connects the last energy line, 
and harnesses a flux line to trigger the time-warp vortex. "Soon, we 
will begin the challenge... soon..." he mumbles to himself, his 
irridecent form shimmering with energy. "...almost...almost..." he 
says to himself, as if urging the Autobot ship to hurry.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Apeface, Quake, Nightmare and Jagged all arrive, land and transform,
> just behind Slugslinger, Dreadwing and Darkwing. They all 
transform, and
> to Havotrons furious screams, enter the ship. Hook looks 
around, "All
> right Constructicons, let's go, and show the Autobots what this 
ships
> got." as he leaps down, into the ship, followed by the rest. 
SLugslinger
> stands beside Soundwave, "Dosent this remind you off the good ol 
days?,
> back to roaring around the Universe. Before we lost the war." 
> 
> Apeface pushes Slugslinger as he climbs on, then pounds his 
chest, "Yes,
> we go to hunt." he yelled. Nightmare carried Jagged to the CR 
chambers. 
> 
> Hook walked to the other constructicons, "So, let's show em what 
this
> babies got." He says, sitting down at the helm of the ship, in the
> navagational area. Scrapper sits beside him, at the guidance 
system. He
> begins to bark out orders. "Mixmaster, activate the cloaking device.
> Scavanger, use our radar system to keep a bead on the hidden one,
> Bonecrusher, Lonhaul, get those weapon systems ready, to blow them 
outta
> the sky." he says with dry emotion.
> 
> Havotron sits in the throne. "Soundwave, block all radio 
transmissions,
> so we arent detected, and happy hunting boys." 
> 
> All Spinister did, was walk over to a window, and contemplativly 
look
> down at the ground, as the rockets burst to life, sending flames 
licking
> the launch pad with raw heat. He watched Cybertron become smaller, 
until
> it was gone. He whispered something, but nobody could make it out.
